Registry of Open Data on AWS

Nanopore Reference Human Genome

genomic life sciences

Description

This dataset includes the sequencing and assembly of a reference standard human genome (GM12878) using the MinION nanopore sequencing instrument with the R9.4 1D chemistry.

Update Frequency

Data will be added as methodology improves or new data uses are encountered.

License

Nanopore Human Reference data is released under the Creative Commons CC-BY license and allows free, full and open access to all. For more details please refer to the data reuse and license section of the documentation.

Documentation

https://github.com/nanopore-wgs-consortium/NA12878

Contact

https://github.com/nanopore-wgs-consortium/NA12878/issues

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Nanopore Reference Human Genome
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::nanopore-human-wgs
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://nanopore-human-wgs/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
